name: Ben DeBaillon
description: Ben DeBaillon, also known asSpaceBoy_66, is aVoodoo Boysnetrunner who, in attempt to climb the gang ladder, tried to take the Grand Imperial Mall from theAnimalsand got discovered byNetWatch, leading him intocyberpsychosis. Ben's plan seemed to be well-thought out although, in lack of proper connections and full gang support, he had to rely on recommendation by word. Prior to even approaching the topic of virtually taking over the mall, he followed a friend's endorsement of a company called Eagle Eye Inc. and hired them to perform reconnaissance and risk assessment of the area. Prior to doing...
